title: Catalytic prenyl conjugate additions for synthesis of enantiomerically enriched PPAPs | Science
content: Polycyclic polyprenylated acylphloroglucinols (PPAPs) are a class of >400 natural products with a broad spectrum of bioactivity, ranging from antidepressant and antimicrobial to anti-obesity and anticancer activity. Here, we present a scalable, regio-, ...
